-- 12. Payment method analysis
SELECT 
    PaymentMethod,
    COUNT(*) AS TransactionCount,
    SUM(Quantity * UnitPrice - ISNULL(Discount, 0)) AS TotalAmount,
    AVG(Quantity * UnitPrice - ISNULL(Discount, 0)) AS AvgTransactionValue
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://adls4salesdata.blob.core.windows.net/transformed-data/sales_clean.parquet/*.parquet',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS s
GROUP BY PaymentMethod
ORDER BY TotalAmount DESC;
